content:
Ordered Collections (2)

  • 3.2.4 Each collection member must appear in the ordering exactly once.

  • 3.2.8 Internal and referential members may be intermixed in the same ordering.

  • 3.2.5 An ordering must not include any resources that are not members of the collection.

  • 3.2.n Only one ordering can be attached to a collection.
